大家好，
不知道要怎麼實踐減塑嗎？9月9日就有機會具體行動囉。
減塑環保洗衣精行動補充車一日快閃體驗

活動時間：2023年9月9日（週六）10:00-16:00
活動地點：沁月莊旁靠集賢館之停車格

活動辦法：最少5元就能購買洗衣精喔。
1.自備適當容器，任何空瓶皆可（鍋碗瓢盆也可啦，建議密封者較佳）。
2.至洗衣精行動補充車處購買。
1公升40元。
1次購買2公升（80元）者，加贈0.5公升（20元）。

加碼【打卡活動】：
現場參加官網臉書按讚分享活動，再玩轉轉樂，抽生活好物小禮喔。

補充說明：
1.為服務剛到校區的新生，活動現場協助幫備回收容器供再利用。幫備容器用完為止，懇請大家珍惜、善用這份貼心暖意，並將使用機會予真無容器者。
2.為減少我們日常生活裡的塑膠垃圾量，行動實踐臺灣2050淨零轉型關鍵戰略-綠生活，花蓮縣政府環保局特別邀請台塑生醫洗衣精行動補充車到校服務，邀請東華教職員生一起生活減塑。

Dear all,
Not sure how to practice plastic reduction? Well, here's your chance to take concrete action on September 9th. Join us for a one-day flash experience with the Plastic Reduction Eco-friendly Laundry Detergent Refill Mobile Vehicle.

Date: September 9th, 2023 (Saturday) from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Location: Parking spaces adjacent to Dormitory VI (Qin-Yue), near East Community House (Ji-Xian).

How it works: You can purchase laundry detergent for as little as 5 NTD.
1. Bring your own suitable container (any empty bottle will do, even pots and pans, but a sealable one is recommended).
2. Purchase from the Laundry Detergent Refill Mobile Vehicle.
•1 liter for 40 NTD.
•Buy 2 liters (80 NTD) and get an additional 0.5 liter (20 NTD) for free.

Bonus Check-In Activity:
Participate in our on-site Facebook liking and sharing event, and play "Turn and Win" for a chance to win some great prizes.

Notes:
1. To serve incoming new students, we will prepare recyclable containers for reuse. We kindly ask everyone to cherish and make good use of this thoughtful gesture until the prepared containers run out, and to share the opportunity with those who have none.
2. In an effort to reduce plastic waste in our daily lives and to implement Taiwan's 2050 Net Zero Transformation Key Strategy for a Green Life, the Environmental Protection Bureau, Hualien County has specially invited the Formosa Biomedical Laundry Detergent Refill Mobile Vehicle to the campus. We invite all Dong Hwa University faculty and students to join in the plastic reduction initiative and adopt a greener lifestyle.
